comments.creator: cmuntean@mozilla.com
comments.raw_text:
[Affected versions]:
- Firefox 64.0 and above

[Affected Platforms]:
- All Windows
- All Linux
- All Mac

[Prerequisites]:
- Have the latest Firefox Nightly build installed.
- Have the "Browser Console" opened.
- Have a Firefox profile with the following pref in the "about:config" page:
	- "browser.newtabpage.activity-stream.asrouterExperimentEnabled" with "true" value;
	
[Steps to reproduce]:
1. Open the browser with the profile from prerequisites.
2. Navigate to "about:config#asrouter" page.
3. Scroll down to the "SNIPPETS_SEND_TO_DEVICE_TEST" section and click the "Show" button.
4. Click the "Install now" button.
5. Observe the Firefox icon.

[Expected result]:
- The Firefox icon is correctly displayed.

[Actual result]:
- The Firefox icon is blurry.

[Additional Notes]:
- This issue is also reproducible with the "Send to Device Email Only", "Send to Device Email Only" and "EOY_BOLD_TEST_1" snippets.
- The issue is more visible for the "Send to Device" snippets.
- Here is a screenshot with "Bold EOY" snippet: https://goo.gl/e924wR
- Here is a screenshot with "Standard EOY" snippet: https://goo.gl/HYcUQR
- Attached a screenshots with the "SNIPPETS_SEND_TO_DEVICE_TEST" snippet.
comments.author: cmuntean@mozilla.com
